entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:51 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 02:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 30 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 9:01 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 to 40 mm except 60 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 9:01 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 9:01 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
